title.narrative: Local Rehabilitation Services for PWD in Lao PDR

description.narrative: Funding under this proposal supports rehabilitation services for people with disability (PWD) in Lao PDR through the Cooperative Orthotic and Prosthetic Enterprise (COPE) in cooperation with the National Rehabilitation Centre (NRC). Australian support will ensure continuation of essential rehabilitation services for PWD in Lao PDR through: ongoing capacity building in clinical rehabilitation skills; meeting essential costs for patients and materials; upgrading of facilities to meet increasing demand for services; and improve access to services through outreach clinical referral. The total value of this initiative is $0.6 million over 3 years, starting 2010-11.
